text: Motion
(I wonder if Mamimi is going to show up...)

Good morning,
Let's work hard today.

Oh, good morning...!
You seem really motivated today, what's going on...?

...I'm shocked that you're so surpsied, though.
Is it that strange for me to be lively?

S-Sorry,
I'm really happy that you're getting into it...

It's just that before you didn't seem very satisfied
with the training camp.

Aaah...
Well, something good happened.
Something good...?
I can get lots of sleep in the morning.

I mean, isn't the lesson studio
like right next to the lodging?

So I can stay tucked in right up until lessons
and get more sleep that usual.
I-Is that right...

What...?
You don't seem too pleased.

Producer, since you don't seem to motivated,
can I go back and get some more sleep?
Motion
W-Wait a minute, Mamimi...!

The no way I'm not motivated!
Haha, looks like we'll have some good lessons today...!

...if you say so.
Well, let's do our best.
